cna.analysis

Class CompositionAnalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • cna.analysis.CompositionAnalysis

  • public class CompositionAnalysis
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides functionality to analyze the composition in terms of repeat families of sam/bam alignment data
    Author:
    Stefan Grabuschnig

      • calculateCompositions

        public static java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<double[]>> calculateCompositions(java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<Alignment>> alignments,
                                                                                                            java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> repeatFamilies)
        Parameters:
        alignments - list of alignments
        repeatFamilies - names of considered repeat families
        Returns:
        a hashmap containing compositions of all alignments as double arrays

      • calculateRepeatAbundances

        public static double[] calculateRepeatAbundances(java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> repeatFamilies,
                                                 Genome genome)
        Parameters:
        repeatFamilies - names of considered repeat families
        genome - the respective genome
        Returns:
        a double array containing the genomic abundances of the specified repeat families

      • calculateReferenceBasedCoverageLevels

        public static java.util.ArrayList<double[]> calculateReferenceBasedCoverageLevels(java.util.ArrayList<double[]> compositions,
                                                                                  double[] repeatAbundances,
                                                                                  int referenceIndex)
        Calculates coverage levels relative to a selected reference from compositions
        Parameters:
        compositions - list of compositions as double arrays
        repeatAbundances - double array containing the genomic abundances of the considered repeat families
        referenceIndex - index of the reference repeat familiy (or non repetetive)
        Returns:
        reference based coverages for all specified compositions

      • evaluateMitoContent

        public static double[] evaluateMitoContent(java.util.ArrayList<Alignment> alignments)
        Parameters:
        alignments - list of alignments
        Returns:
        the contents of mitochondrial DNA for all alignments

      • createChart

        public static void createChart(java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,double[]> data,
                               java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> repeatFamilies,
                               double[] repeatAbundances,
                               boolean monochrome)
        Deprecated. 
        Created a bar-chart illustration of the average composition of the data
        Parameters:
        data - labeled sets of compositions
        repeatFamilies - names of the repeat families
        repeatAbundances - double array containing the abundances of the considered repeat families
        monochrome - false for usage of colors

      • readCompositionsFile

        public static java.util.ArrayList<double[]> readCompositionsFile(java.lang.String label)
        Deprecated. 
        reads composition data from a textfile
        Parameters:
        label - label of the data (must be equal to filename)
        Returns:
        list of double arrays containing the composition data
